extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     6.0 units from PHIL at the 100 level

basic.description: This course will subject a range of issues in practical ethics to philosophical scrutiny.  Topics may include obligations to future generations, the ethics of war and self-defence, whether torture is ever permissible, the ethics of deception, the morality of genetic enhancement, the nature of exploitation, and moral objections to organ sales.
basic.subject: PHIL
basic.title: Practical Ethics
